author: craigmcc
msg: Document the "value" attribute of the <html:image> tag.
Submitted by:	David M. Karr <dmkarr at earthlink.net>

author: craigmcc
msg: Avoid serialization problems by making the upload example use request scope
Submitted by:	Jonathan Corbin <jonboy at rocketmonkey.org>

author: craigmcc
msg: Store the actual exception in the same request attribute that is used by
tags that throw exceptions:  Action.EXCEPTION_KEY.  This makes the exception
object itself available to error handling code.
Submitted by:	Kevin Henrikson <kevin at henrikson.com>

author: craigmcc
msg: The commons-dbcp package is now dependent on commons-lang, so Struts is too.
